availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Livingston and Crittenden County, Kentucky, farmer. Tennessee native. Married to Elizabeth Shaw Duncan in Crittenden County on January 6, 1846. Father of Mary A. Duncan and David L. Duncan. Married to Mary Ann Gaither Duncan in Butler County on April 28, 1854. Father of William B. Duncan and Anthony H. Duncan. Farmer in Crittenden County in 1850. Farmer in Crittenden County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Crittenden County, District 1, p. 245A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Crittenden County, The West Half, p. 349.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Crittenden County Marriages, Film #000558428, p. 19.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Butler County Marriages, Film #000367208, p. 92.
